title: Lost in the Woods
description: Katherine and Darryl plan a romantic camping trip as a break from their hectic lives, but get waylaid by a torrential storm that blows them off their path and to a sleepy cottage. They bunker down for the night, hoping to catch a little sleep in the middle of the storm, but are awakened by the cabin's strong and silent owner. Katherine can't help but feel attracted to him and is betrayed by her own body... A sexy romantic tale of 5800 words, with a double penetration threesome, D/s play, and lots of forced orgasms!
author: Charlotte Chase
